channel.title: Just want to say something
channel.description:
Okay, I may just get warned for this. But this is getting so ANNOYING.
There are a few things everyone has to know.
One. Flaming is bad people. Don't flame someone for asking something you may know, or is simple to solve.
Two. Spamming is bad. People!! SERIOUSLY, you post something totally off-topic like eclipse says:
OK :)
When someone's asking for help. I mean seriously it's annoying!
And three. the 5-7 Posts in a row? Seriously, that can get annoying too, just because someone won't help you at first doesn't mean you need to keep bumping it. It just means you should wait, or PM Someone you KNOW Can help..
And that is all I have to say. Yes I know I may be warned for this. But I really just wanted to state this. Thanks.

item.title: Just want to say something
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

If I am I deserve it.
But I have to say that a member has a right to stand up what’s wrong in a forum.

Read full topic

i agree lol and yes you might be warned for that =\
